summary.subject: Call for Papers: Responsible AI Special Issue Journal - Information Processing & Management
summary.specialIssueDescription: This special issue seeks to bring together cutting-edge research, methodologies, and critical reflections on Responsible Artificial Intelligence (RAI). It aims to understand the ethical, legal, technical, and societal dimensions of AI systems and to provide a venue for interdisciplinary contributions addressing challenges and opportunities in responsible AI.
topicsOfSubmission: Fairness and Bias Mitigation in AI
Sociotechnical and Cultural Dimensions of AI
summary.submissionGuidelines: Original, high-quality submissions are invited, including research articles and review articles. All submissions will undergo a single-blind peer-review process. Authors must disclose any overlapping publications.

contactPerson.name: Calvin Hillis
contactPerson.position: Program Coordinator - Responsible Development of Artificial Intelligence
